name: Moroccan Lentils

ingredients.name: Vegetable stock
ingredients.note: Optional, amount according to Lentil package preparation instructions

ingredients.name: Chili Powder
ingredients.note: More if you like is spicy

instructions: Prepare lentils according to package instructions. Boil in vegetable stock for best results. When cooking is complete, drain and set aside
Place saffron threads in water and set aside
In a large stock pot (like the one you used to cool the lentils), cook diced onion on med-high heat until translucent, about 5 minutes

Add diced tomatoes, seasonings (reserve the last 1/2 tablespoon of Garam Masala), saffron/water, lentils, tomato paste, coconut milk and rasins to onions, stir and bring to gentle simmer, cover, cool for 15-20 minutes
Uncover, add final 1/2 tablespoon of Garam Masala and cook uncovered additional 5-10 minutes or until desired thickness is achieved.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed
